__e: I mean, just being able to sit in a coffee shop and talk.
Well, you know, I guess it's 'cause... I was sitting in a deli and reading Dorian Gray and... a guy comes up to me... and asked me about it, and... now he's my husband.
So I got a call from Andrew, and he-- this is classic Andrew-- he met someone at a coffee shop and now he is hanging out at her house and--
That's why you brought me to this diner in this black neighborhood.
You know when you walk into a café in a strange country and order a cup of coffee.
I'm sitting in a cafe in Spain. And don't know a single person there. And I can't understand a single word that anyone's saying.
